response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 by us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,150,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of seamless transaction processes and unparalleled customer support throughout the entire experience. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 1150000}
